title: Invitation to tender: ODINE website redesign and development

details.alternative_title: Invitation to tender: ODINE website redesign and development
details.content:
This is a call for tenders by the Open Data Institute for the Open Data Incubator for Europe (ODINE).

The objective of this work is to deliver UX testing, a new design proposal and WordPress site implementation for the ODINE website.

The selected design agency will support a team from the ODINE consortium, who will provide guidance and oversee overall design.

Key aims

  • Define audience needs
  • Build a strong identity that promotes the project
  • Provide clear calls to action for different audiences
  • Showcase the impact of the project through stories and case studies
  • Design and implement a fully responsive WordPress website, with SEO in mind
  • Create targeted landing pages for each audience

Duration

Approximately six weeks

A full brief can be found here

Tender responses should be sent to orsola.demarco@theodi.org by 09.00 GMT on Monday, 7 December 2015.
